trans-unit.source: $tagRECT structure that contains the coordinates of the upper-left and lower-right corners of the bounding rectangle of the ellipse in logical units.

seg-source.mrk: $tagRECT structure that contains the coordinates of the upper-left and lower-right corners of the bounding rectangle of the ellipse in logical units.

target.mrk: $tagRECT structure that contains the coordinates of the upper-left and lower-right corners of the bounding rectangle of the ellipse in logical units.

trans-unit.source: A bounding rectangle defines the size, shape, and orientation of the region: The long sides of the rectangle define the length of the ellipse's major axis; the short sides define the length of the ellipse's minor axis; and the center of the rectangle defines the intersection of the major and minor axes.

seg-source.mrk: A bounding rectangle defines the size, shape, and orientation of the region:

The long sides of the rectangle define the length of the ellipse's major axis; the short sides define the length of the ellipse's minor axis; and the center of the rectangle defines the intersection of the major and minor axes.

target.mrk: A bounding rectangle defines the size, shape, and orientation of the region:

The long sides of the rectangle define the length of the ellipse's major axis; the short sides define the length of the ellipse's minor axis; and the center of the rectangle defines the intersection of the major and minor axes.

trans-unit.source: When you no longer need the HRGN object, call the _WinAPI_DeleteObject() function to delete it.

seg-source.mrk: When you no longer need the HRGN object, call the _WinAPI_DeleteObject() function to delete it.

target.mrk: When you no longer need the HRGN object, call the _WinAPI_DeleteObject() function to delete it.
